p: Data extraction was performed independently by two of the authors (I. H. and R. P.). We used standardized extraction forms that included author, year, study design, age, sex, cardiovascular diseases, history of hypertension and diabetes mellitus, respiratory comorbidities, antibiotics and antiviral use, glucocorticoid use, lymphopenia, follow-up duration, arrhythmia, mortality, ICU care, and severe COVID-19. The quality and risk of bias assessment of the included studies will be performed using the Newcastle-Ottawa Scale.
